text: And he put forth the form of a hand, and took me by a lock of my head; and the Spirit lifted me up between earth and heaven, and brought me in the visions of God to Jerusalem, to the door of the gate of the inner <FI>court<Fi> that looketh toward the north; where was the seat of the image of jealousy, which provoketh to jealousy.
name: Ezekiel 8:3
